mapper.select:
SELECT t1.*, t2.STATION_NAME FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RECORD t1 LEFT JOIN SYS_STATION t2 on t1.STATION_CODE=t2.STATION_CODE WHERE t1.DEL_FLAG='0'
AND to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=t1.START_DATE
AND t1.END_DATE>=to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND t1.ID=#{id}

SELECT t1.*,t2.STATION_NAME AS approvalStationName FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_APPROVAL t1 LEFT JOIN SYS_STATION t2 on t1.APPROVAL_STATION=t2.STATION_CODE WHERE DEL_FLAG='0'
AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE
ORDER BY START_DATE desc

SELECT * FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_APPROVAL WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND DATA_TYPE=#{dataType} AND START_DATE=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND END_DATE=to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT t2.SUBMIT_STATION,t3.STATION_CODE FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RELATION t1 LEFT JOIN TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_APPROVAL t2 on t1.APPROVAL_ID=t2.ID LEFT JOIN TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RECORD t3 on t1.RECORD_ID=t3.ID WHERE t1.DEL_FLAG='0' AND t1.APPROVAL_STATUS='0' AND t1.APPROVAL_ID=#{approvalId} AND t1.RECORD_ID=#{recordId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RECORD (ID, STATION_CODE, DATA_TYPE,
DATA_DATE,
START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{stationCode},#{dataType},
to_date(#{dataDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{createBy}, sysdate,#{createBy}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RECORD SET STATUS=#{status}, UPDATE_DATE=sysdate WHERE ID=#{id}

UPDATE TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RECORD SET TYPE1_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='1' AND STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE2_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='2' AND STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE3_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='3' AND STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE4_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='4' AND STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE5_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='5' AND STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE6_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='6' AND STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE) WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_APPROVAL (ID, APPROVAL_STATION,TITLE,SUBMIT_STATION, DATA_TYPE,
DATA_DATE,
START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{approvalStation},#{title},#{submitStation}, #{dataType},
to_date(#{dataDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{createBy}, sysdate,#{createBy}, sysdate)
INSERT INTO TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RELATION (ID, APPROVAL_ID,RECORD_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{approvalId},#{recordId}, #{createBy}, sysdate,#{createBy}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RELATION SET APPROVAL_STATUS=#{status}, UPDATE_BY=#{updateBy}, UPDATE_DATE=sysdate WHERE APPROVAL_ID=#{approvalId} AND RECORD_ID=#{recordId} AND APPROVAL_STATUS='0'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRAFFIC_PRO_EVENT_DETAIL WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND INFO_ID = #{infoId} ORDER BY EVENT_TIME ASC

SELECT t1.ID, t1.STATION_CODE, t1.START_DATE, t1.END_DATE FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RECORD t1 LEFT JOIN SYS_STATION t2 ON t1.STATION_CODE=t2.STATION_CODE AND t2.OPEN_FLAG='1' WHERE t1.DEL_FLAG='0' AND t1.DATA_TYPE='2'
AND t1.START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=t1.END_DATE
ORDER BY t1.CREATE_DATE desc

SELECT b.DAY_TIME as EVENT_TIME, LISTAGG(a.EVENT_DESC, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY b.DAY_TIME) AS EVENT_DESC FROM ( SELECT to_char(t.DATA_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') DATA_DATE, t.EVENT_DESC FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO t WHERE t.DATA_TYPE='1' AND t.STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND t.PRODUCTION_TYPE='2' ORDER BY to_char(t.DATA_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') asc ) a RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')+ROWNUM-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DAY_TIME FROM DUAL CONNECT BY TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=ROWNUM ) b ON a.DATA_DATE = b.DAY_TIME GROUP BY b.DAY_TIME ORDER BY b.DAY_TIME
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO (ID, RECORD_ID, STATION_CODE,PRODUCTION_TYPE,
TITLE,
WORK_TIME,
WORK_TIME_END,
WORK_CODE,
WORK_DEPT,
WORK_CONTENT,
EVENT_DESC,
EVENT_AFFECT,
EVENT_HANDLE,
PIC_URL,
IS_CLOSE,
RESULT,
DATA_TYPE,
DATA_DATE,
START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DATE) VALUES ( #{id}, #{recordId},#{stationCode},#{productionType},
#{title},
to_date(#{workTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
to_date(#{workTimeEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{workCode},
#{workDept},
#{workContent},
#{eventDesc},
#{eventAffect},
#{eventHandle},
#{picUrl},
#{isClose},
#{result},
#{dataType},
to_date(#{dataDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{createBy}, sysdate,#{createBy}, sysdate)

insert ALL
INTO TRAFFIC_PRO_EVENT_DETAIL ( INFO_ID, EVENT_TIME, EVENT_DESC, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DATE) VALUES ( #{parentId}, to_date(#{item.eventTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{item.eventDesc}, #{createBy}, sysdate,#{createBy}, sysdate)
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO SET
PRODUCTION_TYPE=#{productionType},
TITLE=#{title},
WORK_TIME=to_date(#{workTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
WORK_TIME_END=to_date(#{workTimeEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
WORK_CODE=#{workCode},
WORK_DEPT=#{workDept},
WORK_CONTENT=#{workContent},
EVENT_DESC=#{eventDesc},
EVENT_AFFECT=#{eventAffect},
EVENT_HANDLE=#{eventHandle},
PIC_URL=#{picUrl},
IS_CLOSE=#{isClose},
RESULT=#{result},
VERSION=VERSION+1, UPDATE_BY=#{updateBy}, UPDATE_DATE=sysdate WHERE ID=#{id} AND VERSION=#{version}

UPDATE TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_RECORD SET TYPE1_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='1' AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE2_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='2' AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE3_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='3' AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE4_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='4' AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE5_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='5' AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE), TYPE6_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRAFFIC_PRODUCTION_INFO WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND PRODUCTION_TYPE='6' AND START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE) WHERE DEL_FLAG ='0' AND DATA_TYPE=#{dataType} AND START_DATE=to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND END_DATE=to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
